advancement.roots.guide.desc: 結合一本書和野根來獲得一本基本指導書
advancement.roots.terra_moss.desc: Scrape the magical growth off mossy cobblestone by right-clicking with a knife.
advancement.roots.pyre.desc: 為魔法儀式和合成搭建一個柴堆!
advancement.roots.fey_crafter.desc: 建造一個精靈工匠台來取得森林之石頭之力
advancement.roots.grove_stone.desc: 用咒術向精靈祈願來啟動森林之石
advancement.roots.runic_shears.desc: Personally craft Runic Shears to pluck magical equivalents from the fey!
advancement.roots.moonglow_leaf.desc: 利用火堆合成螢月之葉
advancement.roots.spirit_herb.desc: Use Runic Shears to fetch Spirit Herb from the Fey.
advancement.roots.wildewheet.desc: Use Runic Shears to fetch Wildewheet from the Fey.
advancement.roots.infernal_bulb.desc: 利用火堆合成地獄鱗梗
advancement.roots.baffle_cap.desc: 利用火堆合成困惑蘑菇
advancement.roots.runestone.desc: Forge runestone with the power of the Fey.
advancement.roots.living.desc: Personally craft a complete set of Living Tools.
advancement.roots.pacifist.desc: 祝賀你殺死了一個友善的生物!
advancement.roots.sylvan_armor.desc: Personally craft a complete set of Sylan Robes.
advancement.roots.wildwood_armor.desc: Personally craft a complete set of Wildwood Armor.
advancement.roots.apothecary_pouch.desc: Personally craft an Apothecary Pouch to improve your storage.
advancement.roots.wildwood.desc: 通過任意形式野根生長儀式獲得野木

jei.roots.terra_moss.desc: 用小刀從苔蘚鵝卵石刮掉獲得。注入大地苔蘚孢子的鵝卵石在與水相鄰時會長出苔蘚
jei.roots.terra_spores.desc: 破壞草可掉落；可將與水相鄰的鵝卵石變成青苔鵝卵石
jei.roots.wildroot.desc: 破壞草可掉落，另外還極為罕見的從野木樹的葉子中掉落
jei.roots.bark.desc: 通過用小刀破壞原木可獲得
jei.roots.wildwood.desc: Once a sacred tree, the only remnant of these that remain in the world are their wildroots. From these a skilled wild mage, with the correct words and ingredients, can invoke the ritual of Wildroot Growth.
jei.roots.wildwood_sapling.desc: 一棵稀有的珍貴幼苗，不再生成，幾乎所有的它們都隨著老年德魯伊而隱秘
jei.roots.wildwood_leaves.desc: 與其它樹的葉子不同，莊嚴的野木不再有孕育樹苗的力量。相反，野根作為野木所有部分中的共同生命核心，可能被發現藏在樹葉和樹枝之間
jei.roots.elemental_soil_fire.desc: 把一塊元素土扔進岩漿而形成
jei.roots.elemental_soil_water.desc: 把一塊元素土扔進水中，並等待幾秒鐘而形成
jei.roots.elemental_soil_air.desc: 把一塊元素土扔到露天的高空而形成
jei.roots.elemental_soil_earth.desc: 把一塊元素土置入不見天日的地底而形成
roots.quiver.fragile: 這些箭袋長出的箭不能撿起
config.roots.category.rituals.tooltip: 設定每種儀式的啟用/停用情況及其它的儀式相關設定。
config.roots.category.spells.tooltip: 設定每種咒術的啟用/停用情況及其它的咒術相關設定。
config.roots.category.moss.tooltip: 設定大地菌絲土的生長與收集設定。
config.roots.category.elemental_soil.too: 設定元素土的轉化設定。
config.roots.category.crops.tooltip: 設定生長類與收穫類咒術的相關設定
roots.runic_shears.cooldown: 此時精靈沒有什麼等價物可以送給你.
roots.life_essence.cooldown: 你暫時還不能提取這個生物的精華。
roots.life_essence.invalid: 這個生物的生命精華無法提取。
roots.runic_shears.tooltip1: %s一個方塊或實體來嘗試收集精靈的饋贈。
roots.runic_shears.tooltip2: %s一個實體來嘗試提取它的生命精華。
roots.ritual.transmutation.deadbush_coco: 通過自然嬗變儀式取得，附近的枯灌叢會變成可可豆.
roots.ritual.transmutation.birch_jungle: 通過自然嬗變儀式取得，附近的樺木樹木會變成叢林木.
roots.ritual.transmutation.birch_jungle_: 通過自然嬗變儀式取得，附近的樺木樹葉會變成叢林木葉.
roots.ritual.transmutation.pumpkin_melon: 通過自然嬗變儀式取得，靠近水的南瓜或者在水中的南瓜會變成西瓜.
roots.ritual.transmutation.pumpkin_cactu: 通過自然嬗變儀式取得，南瓜放在沙上會變成仙人掌.

item.roots_guide.name: The Magic of the Wilds
item.roots.roots_guide.name: The Magic of the Wilds
info.roots.roots_guide.landing: This book is a compilation of knowledge about natural magic, dating from the age of Druids and down into the modern era.$(br2)Today, wild mages seek to discover new and rediscover old ways in which the natural world acts as a source of magic & change.

roots.glass_eye.tooltip: Right-Click to shatter and grant vision in dark places.
roots.fire_starter.tooltip: Hold Right-Click to slowly start a fire. Single use.
roots.message.salmon_eaten: You suddenly feel more knowledgeable about the world!
roots.message.no_library: You need the Spell Library open to use this keybind!
roots.message.no_storage: An error occurred in deleting this spell.
roots.message.runic_crafter.no_grove: There's no active Grove Stone nearby!
roots.message.sense_time: It is currently %s on day %s; the moon %s.
roots.message.respawn.cant_respawn_dimen: Sorry, but your bed is in another dimension!
roots.message.spell_imbued: The spell %s has been added to your library!
roots.message.spell_already: The spell %s is already in your library.
roots.message.hold_staff: You must be holding a staff to open the spell library.
roots.message.natures_scythe.no_modifier: This spell requires one or more of the following modifiers to be enabled to function: %s, %s, %s, %s or %s.
roots.message.augment.no_modifier: This spell requires one or more modifiers to be enabled to function.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.additional_tar: An additional target will be affected by Geas.
An additional target will be affected by Geas.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.amplified_heal: The healing gained from the damage caused is amplified.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.amplified_satu: Adjusts the ratio, cause consume saturation to heal for more.
Applies an absorption shield to all nearby peaceful entities.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.antivenom.desc: Foods that cause poison no longer do so, and give more saturation.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.aquaplane.desc: Movement boost is limited to the horizontal axis, excluding vertical movement.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.arboreal_bypas: Allows you to travel through trees while being boosted by this spell.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.armor_i.desc: Increases the chances of armor being removed.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.armor_ii.desc: Increases the chances of armor being removed.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.arms_of_air.de: Additionally increases the radius that crops are affected.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.augment_slow_f: Reduces the speed at which you fall.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.avalanche.desc: Deals physical damage to affected creatures.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.barkskin.desc: Attackers are slowed whenever they hit you.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.big_bellied.de: Adjusts the saturation ratio, giving you more saturation from food.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.bitter_luck.de: Grants you Luck... but only luck for some things.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.blaze.desc: Affected creatures are set on fire.
Increases the speed at which blocks are harvested.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.blue_light.des: Creates a light that is blue.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.boost_drops.de: Increases the chances of disarmed items being dropped.
Launches creatures who trigger the trap into the air.
Foods that you must drink give more saturation.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.brimstone.desc: Part of the damage is dealt as fire.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.brown_light.de: Creates a light that is brown.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.bubble_amplifi: Greatly increase the amount of damage absorbed by the bubble.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.bubble_knockba: Melee attackers are knocked back from you.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.burning_ray.de: Afflicts damaged targets with fire and sets them aflame.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.chem_trails.de: Causes clouds of smoke to form in your wake.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.chthonic.desc: Water-based and creatures in water take increased damage.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.circle_of_wind: Causes the effect in a circle around you, instead of a specific angle.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.cooked_goods.d: Foods that are cooked give more saturation.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.decaying_light: Causes all created fey lights to slowly decay and disappear.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.deeper.desc: Increases the depth dug to three blocks, regardless of the size.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.deluminator.de: Consumes all fey lights within a radius.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.disarm_duumvir: Affects two creatures instead of one.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.distributed_he: Causes the healing to be distributed amongst you and nearby allies.
After the effect ends, creatures are weakened for a duration.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.earthen_radius: Increases the radius of the spell.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.embiggening.de: Causes mushrooms and saplings to grow into their larger forms.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.empowering_tra: Grants you strength when a trap is triggered.
The duration of the boost is increased by a significant amount.
Causes excess healing to grant you an absorption shield.
Causes excess healing to damage nearby hostile creatures.
Causes excess healing to be dispersed into nearby crops & other growables.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.excess_heal.de: Causes excess healing to be dispersed amongst nearby allies.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.excess_levitat: Causes excess healing to levitate you instead.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.excess_purific: Excess healing purifies you over negative potion effects.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.excess_stone_s: Causes excess healing to grant you resistance.
Increases the duration of the geas.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.extended_harve: Increases the range of harvested crops.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.extinguisher.d: Extinguishes flames in the direction that you're facing.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.faithful_shari: A single creature tamed by you nearby is also affected.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.false_night.de: Has a chance to reset a nearby villagers' locked trades.
Causes harvested items to be processed by any relevant furnace recipe.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.fire_and_ice.d: Large icy projectiles cause additional damage to afflicted targets.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.fire_cloud.des: Flames mingle with the acid & burn enemies.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.fire_trap.desc: Sets creatures who trigger the trap on fire.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.fixed_light.de: Creates a light directly where you stand.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.flaming_wind.d: Sets affected creatures and eligible nearby blocks on fire.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.floating_cinde: Damaged creatures are also levitated for a short period of time.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.flower_child.d: Affected creatures have weapons replaced with flowers.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.flower_spreadi: Causes a single targeted flower to reproduce rapidly.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.fortunate_scyt: The level of fortune applied by the spell is increased by 2.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.freed_familiar: No longer affects creatures tamed by you.
Causes nearby water blocks to freeze.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.friendly_earth: Prevents damage taken from falling shortly after casting the spell.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.ghostly_trap.d: Deals additional damage to undead creatures who trigger the trap.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.gifts_of_undea: Has a chance to harvest gifts from undead, invisible spirits.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.glowing_ray.de: Causes all affected targets to glow for a period of time.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.green_light.de: Creates a light that is green.
Creatures affected take increased fall damage.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.harvest_silk_t: Blocks are broken as though with silk touch.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.hasty_escape.d: You are granted speed whenever you stop an enemy.
Instead of causing damage, the cloud heals.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.healing_rain.d: Heals nearby allies and extinguishes fires.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.healing_ray.de: Causes healing instead of doing damage.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.hydration.desc: The ground beneath grown crops is hydrated to the maximum.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.ice_age.desc: Deals cold damage to enemies once the effect is complete.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.icicles.desc: Flings sharp icicles at any enemy struck by wildfire.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.ignification.d: Causes nearby lava blocks to convert into obsidian.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.increased_spee: While casting this, your speed is increased.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.incubation.des: Baby animals in range will grow.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.inferno.desc: Deals fire damage to affected creatures.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.inflammatory_b: Affected creatures are stricken with fire.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.inversion.desc: Lower saturation foods grant a higher value of food and saturation.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.iron_excess.de: Excess saturation is converted into a temporary resistance effect.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.iron_gut.desc: Foods that cause nausea or hunger no longer do so, and give more saturation.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.item_updraft.d: Causes items floating on the ground to also be affected.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.jaunt.desc: Moves you a short distance, landing on the next highest or lowest block.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.larger_trap.de: The area which creatures must enter to trigger the trap is increased.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.leaf_harvester: Additionally harvests leaves from nearby trees.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.levitating_bub: Affected creatures are stricken with levitation.
Enter an incorporeal state, drifting and seeing through objects.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.lightened_load: Reduces the healing gained but increases the damage dealt.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.lightning_stri: Causes nearby targets to be rarely struck by lightning.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.liquid_lurch.d: Affected creatures are knocked backwards by a jet of water.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.liquid_repulsi: Blasts affected creatures backwards with strong currents.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.magnetic_harve: Teleports harvested items directly to you.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.magnetic_radia: Teleports drops & XP of slain creatures to you.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.magnetic_ray.d: Teleports all dropped blocks to you.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.minor_halt.des: Reduces the duration that enemies are stopped for.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.momentum.desc: Increases the momentum gained from the spell.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.moon_bubble.de: Magical damage dealt to you is halved.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.moonfall.desc: Does greater damage depending on the time of night and closeness to midnight.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.moss_harvest.d: Scrapes moss away from eligible blocks, converting them and dropping terra moss.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.mushroom_harve: Additionally harvests mushrooms (although not tall mushrooms).
roots.modifiers.modifiers.nondetection.d: Reduce the radius at which enemies can detect you.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.ore_infusion.d: Single blocks of stone have a chance to be randomly converted into an ore.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.overtime.desc: Increases the duration that enemies are stopped for.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.peaceful_dance: Additionally affects a single nearby creature who is tamed by you.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.peaceful_drain: Prevents peaceful creatures from being affected.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.peaceful_flame: Peaceful creatures are no longer damaged.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.peaceful_radia: Prevents peaceful creatures from being damaged by the spell.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.peaceful_storm: Peaceful creatures are no longer affected by this spell.
Peaceful creatures no longer trigger the trap.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.peaceful_winds: Peaceful creatures are no longer affected.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.petal_overflow: Increases the maximum number of charges to 5.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.pink_light.des: Creates a light that is pink.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.poison_protect: Additionally protects you from poison for the duration.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.poison_storm.d: Creatures who are damaged by this spell are also poisoned.
Part of the damage dealt is dealt as poison.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.poisonous_bree: Causes affected creatures to become poisoned.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.poisonous_trap: Poisons creatures who trigger the trap.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.purple_light.d: Creates a light that is purple.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.pyroclastic_cl: Wherever Wildfire strikes, leaves behind patches of fey fire.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.radius_boost.d: Increases the radius of the cloud.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.rampant_breedi: Causes nearby or targetted creatures to go into breeding mode.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.rampant_growth: Additionally increases the radius that crops are affected.
Additionally increases the radius that crops are affected.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.reach.desc: Increases the distance you can reach with tools.
Causes creatures who attack you to take physical damage & begin bleeding.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.react_drift.de: Causes creatures who attack you to start levitating.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.react_fire.des: Sets creatures who attack you on fire.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.react_radiance: Causes creatures who attack you radiant damage.
Enemies who attack you while the cloud is active are jolted with electricity.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.red_light.desc: Creates a light that is red.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.reflective_bub: Fire damage dealt to you is also reflected back at the attacker as physical damage.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.regenerative_s: Grants regeneration when the spell is cast.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.regrowth.desc: Each harvested crop has a chance to distribute growth to nearby crops.
Peaceful creatures are now affected by the bubble.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.repelling_trap: Causes creatures who trigger the trap to be flung backwards.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.repulsive_bubb: Any creature inside the bubble is flung away.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.scattered_good: Nearby food items on the ground are consumed.
Highlights nearby animals for a duration.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.sense_home.des: Be given a sign that points towards your spawn location.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.sense_hostiles: Highlights nearby hostile creatures for a duration.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.sense_ores.des: Highlights either all nearby ores or the ore held in your off-hand.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.sense_plants.d: Highlights nearby growing plants and plant life.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.shatter_fortun: Increases the level of fortune applied to block breaking by 2.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.shatter_silk_t: Blocks broken are broken as though done with the Silk Touch enchantment.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.shatter_void.d: Instead of breaking blocks, blocks are instantly destroyed and deleted.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.sickly_ray.des: Afflicts damaged targets with a sickening poison.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.silk_scythe.de: Blocks broken are broken as though done with the Silk Touch enchantment.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.slow_fall.desc: Grants you the slow fall effect once the boost ends.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.slow_falling.d: Creatures affected are granted slow fall.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.slowing.desc: Slows creatures who are damaged by the cloud.
Slows creatures that are affected by the drain.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.slowing_trap.d: Slows creatures who are affected by the trap.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.smelting_ray.d: Blocks broken are processed as though smelted in a furnace.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.spectral_drain: Has a chance to drain the life of a faint spirit if no other targets are available.
Undead deal decreased damage to you.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.spiritual_dual: Fires an additional jet of flame when cast.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.spread.desc: Increases the radius of the storm.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.stoneskin.desc: Additionally grants resistance for a duration.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.strong_gusts.d: The winds blow creatures further and higher.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.suction.desc: Reverses the effects, sucking affected creatures towards you instead.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.taller.desc: Increases the height dug to three blocks, regardless of the size.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.targeted_drain: Drains only from the creature targeted.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.targeted_harve: Reduces the radius of the spell to the eight squares around you.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.thoughtful.des: Prevents overconsumption of saturation and the creation of overhealing.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.time_slip.desc: After the effect ends, creatures are slowed for a duration.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.underwater_inc: Increase the effectiveness of the spell when cast underwater.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.unholy_command: Forces affected undead creatures to instead fight for you.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.unholy_vanquis: Does increased damage to the undead.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.verticality.de: Shoots you straight up, regardless of where you're looking.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.voiding_scythe: Items that are broken by this spell are instead destroyed and their drops voided.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.waterfall.desc: Deals water damage to affected creatures.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.weakened_respo: Affected creatures have weakness applied to them.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.weakness.desc: Entities who are disarmed are also weakened.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.wider.desc: Increases the width dug to three blocks, regardless of the size.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.wider_ray.desc: Causes the width of the ray to widen.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.withering.desc: Affected creatures are stricken with withering.
Afflicts damaged targets with the withering effect.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.yellow_light.d: Creates a light that is yellow.
roots.modifiers.modifiers.yield.desc: Causes harvested items to be processed by any relevant mortar & pestle recipe.
roots.spirit_pouch.tooltip: Right-click to open and reveal what's inside!
roots.reliquary.tooltip: Right-click to open and reveal what's inside!
roots.living_hoe.tooltip: Breaks plants in a large radius.
